net.sourceforge.waters.model.des

Interface AutomatonProxy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<NamedProxy>, ComparableProxy<NamedProxy>, NamedProxy, Proxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutomatonElement

    public interface AutomatonProxy
extends NamedProxy

    A finite-state machine.

    This class is a straightforward representation of a finite-state machine or Kripke structure. It consists of an event alphabet, a list of states, and a list transitions.

    The alphabet contains all the events that are used for synchronisation between this and other automata, and all the propositions used to label states of this Kripke structure. Events not contained in the alphabet are assumed to be selflooped in all states of this automaton. Propositions not contained in the alphabet are assumed to be true in all states.

    In addition, finite-state machines in a discrete-event systems context can be classified as plant or specification. This is information is also associated with each automaton.

    Author:
    Robi Malik

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        AutomatonProxy clone()
        Creates and returns a copy of this automaton. This method supports the general contract of the clone() method. Its precise semantics differs for different implementations of the Proxy interface.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface ComparableProxy<NamedProxy>
        Specified by:
        clone in interface NamedProxy
        Specified by:
        clone in interface Proxy

      • getKind

        ComponentKind getKind()
        Gets the kind (plant, specification, etc.) of this automaton.

      • getEvents

        Set<EventProxy> getEvents()
        Gets the event alphabet for this automaton. This method returns the set of events on which this automaton synchronises, or the set of all events that can occur on its transitions.
        Returns:
        The set of events.

      • getStates

        Set<StateProxy> getStates()
        Gets the set of states for this automaton.
        Returns:
        The set of states.

      • getTransitions

        Collection<TransitionProxy> getTransitions()
        Gets the list of transitions for this automaton.
        Returns:
        A collection of transitions. Implementations may or may not guarantee the absence of duplicates.

      • getAttributes

        Map<String,String> getAttributes()
        Gets the attribute map for this automaton. The attribute map can be used by tools supporting external model formats to store information that does not appear in standard DES models.
        Returns:
        An immutable map mapping attribute names to values.
